issue.title: Could we add a choke to the solar array power cable

content.raw: I'm fumbling with that cord too.  Feels like I am at one of those carnival games where you have to use pincers to grab a toy-- it keeps slipping through my grasp.  This one is too narrow for Val to hold and the leak detector is too fat.  I figured it was just me, so it is reassuring that I am not alone in this.
content.html: I'm fumbling with that cord too. Feels like I am at one of those carnival games where you have to use pincers to grab a toy-- it keeps slipping through my grasp.
